Q.1. Who has been appointed as Chief Secretary of Kerala?
Q.2. Government has ceased the 7.75% Savings Bonds scheme commonly known as RBI Bonds or GOI bonds for subscription due to the declining interest rates. Where is the headquarters of RBI?
Q.3. Which organisation release the report "Children in monetary poor households and COVID-19: Technical Note"?
Q.4. Which country approves sanctions on Chinese officials involved in ill-treatment of Uighurs in Xinjiang?

Q.5. Principal Scientific Adviser to the GoI stated that in order to succeed against the COVID-19 pandemic, a large number of parallel efforts are being taken. Who is Principal Scientific Adviser to the GoI?

Q.6. Governor of Maharashtra has made certain modifications in Section 6 of the Scheduled Tribes and Other Traditional Forest Dwellers Act, 2006, in its application to the Scheduled Areas of the State of Maharashtra. Who is the Governor of Maharashtra?
Q.7. Who launched the facility of instant PAN through Aadhaar based e-KYC on 28 May?
Q.8. What is the new name of the Central Institute of Plastics Engineering & Technology after Centre has been renamed it on 28 May, 2020?
(A) Central Institute of Petrochemicals Engineering & Technology
(B) Central Institute of Plastics and chemicals Engineering & Technology
(C) Central Institute of chemicals Engineering & Technology
(D) Central Institute of chemicals and Plastics Engineering & Technology
Q.9. Who inaugurated the 1st Solar Lift Irrigation Plant of Kargil with five kilowatt Solar Plant and 3 Horsepower Submersible Pump at Yak Breeding Farm, Bodh Kharboo?
Q.10. Who is appointed as a member of the Olympic Channel Commission from India?
Q.11. The Asian Development Bank and the GoI signed a $177 million loan to upgrade 450 kilometers of state highways and major district roads in which state?

Q.12. Vakrangee Limited has entered into the Corporate Agency partnership with which company to distribute latter's micro insurance products through its Nextgen Vakrangee Kendra network spread across India?
(B) Bajaj Allianz Life Insurance Co. Ltd.
(C) Aditya Birla Sun Life Insurance Co. Ltd.
Q.13. Indian Space Research Organisation has received a patent for its method of manufacturing highland lunar soil simulant or moon soil. This soil is made from anorthosite rocks of which state?

Q.14. S&P Global Ratings , an American credit rating agency, has projected India's GDP growth for the current fiscal year FY 21 to contract by how much percent from 1.8 % growth projected in April 2020?
Q.15. World Menstrual Hygiene Day observed on which date?
Q.16. Who will take charge as the chairman of JP Morgan, South and Southeast Asia after Kalpana Morparia retirement in 2021?

Q.17. The Indian Air Force operationalised its 2nd squadron No. 18 'Flying Bullet' equipped with Light Combat Aircraft Tejas Final Operational Clearance at its Sulur Air Force Station in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. Who is the Chief of the Air Staff India?
Q.18. The Union Minister for Agriculture & Farmers' Welfare held a high-level meeting to review the Locust Control Operations. Who is current Union Minister for Agriculture?
Q.19. International Day of UN Peacekeepers is observed on which day every year?
Q.20. Recently, which "World Hunger Day" has been celebrated worldwide on 28 May 2020?
Q.21. Recently, the famous person 'Ajit Jogi' has passed away, he was the first Chief Minister of which state?
